articles.title: Australia drop five catches against South Africa
articles.description: Marcus Stoinis, Mitchell Starc and Pat Cummins are amongst the guilty parties as Australia drop five catches against South Africa in their Cricket World Cup game in Lucknow, India.
articles.content:
Marcus Stoinis, Mitchell Starc and Pat Cummins are amongst the guilty parties as Australia drop five catches against South Africa in their Cricket World Cup game in Lucknow, India.

articles.title: World Cup: South Africa bat first after Australia win toss
articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as Australia play South Africa in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.content:
Quinton de Kock has clearly decided it's time to get a move on!
He slashes the first ball of the over through point for four and, two balls later, tries to pull Josh Hazlewood to the fence.

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
